titleStmt.title: The anatomie of sorcerie VVherein the wicked impietie of charmers, inchanters, and such like, is discouered and confuted. By Iames Mason, Master of Artes.
titleStmt.author: Mason, James, M.A.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Legatte, printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge. 1612. And are to be sold in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Crowne by Simon Waterson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Crowne
